definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
pavilion in the air (idiom); unrealistic Utopian construction/castles in Spain/imaginary future plans

pinyin: kong1 zhong1 jiao1 tong1 guan3 zhi4
kong1 zhong1 jiao1 tong1 guan3 zhi4 yuan2

sentences.english: As the winds did those of the upper air.
sentences.chinese: 正如秋风把花瓣在空中扬散。

sentences.english: And as they cried out and threw off their garments, and cast dust into the air.
sentences.chinese: 他们遂喧哗呐喊，扔下衣服，并向空中扬土。

sentences.english: Alleviating air traffic congestion is one of the major goals of the new push into high-speed rail.
sentences.chinese: 推动高铁发展的主要目的，就是缓解空中交通的拥挤。

sentences.english: Aloft in the air, as if from the depths of the cloud, came a confused and doubtful sound of voices.
sentences.chinese: 高空中，仿佛自云团深处，传来一片可疑的嘈杂人声。
喷气式战斗机在空中侦察巡逻。

sentences.english: Boeing ( BA - news - people ) can sell more planes than Airbus.
sentences.chinese: 波音公司可以比空中客车卖出更多的飞机。

sentences.english: Airbus delivered 18 of its A380 superjumbo last year.
sentences.chinese: 空中客车交付18架其A380超巨型飞机去年。

sentences.english: I watched Cla room on the Air on TV.
sentences.chinese: 我收看电视中的“空中课堂”。

sentences.english: The whip swished through the air.
sentences.chinese: 鞭子嗖地一声在空中挥动。

sentences.english: I say, make time to dance a hop, one hand waving free.
sentences.chinese: 要我说，花点时间为自己跳支舞，一只手在空中挥舞。

sentences.english: It glittered in the gigantic sky.
At that point he phoned me for aerial support.
sentences.chinese: 这时，他给我打电话要求空中定位支援。

sentences.english: He dreamed a black swan and several swallows flying in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 他梦见一只黑天鹅和几只燕子在空中飞翔。

sentences.english: Lo and behold, the boy sat in the cross - legged position , suspended in mid- air, without falling.
sentences.chinese: 孩子以双腿交叉坐着的姿势悬在空中，并没有掉下来。

sentences.english: Rootless things fly through the air toward her and land at her feet.
sentences.chinese: 空中的飞行物都会朝她飞来，落在她的脚边。

sentences.english: Air traffic controllers had already informed the military about the hijacking.
sentences.chinese: 空中交通管制员已通知军方有关劫机的事情。

definition: to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit
to rise to the sky/to lift off/to levitate/liftoff
be high up in the sky
to dive down fast/to swoop down
